articles.title: Argentina says farmers have sold 34.8 mln tonnes of 2020/21 soybeans
articles.description: BUENOS AIRES, Nov 24 (Reuters) - Argentine farmers have sold 34.8 million tonnes of 2020/21 soybeans so far, the Agriculture Ministry said on Wednesday in a report with data updated through Nov. 17.The rhythm of sales has been slower than that of the previous season.
articles.content:
BUENOS AIRES, Nov 24 (Reuters) - Argentine farmers have sold 34.8 million tonnes of 2020/21 soybeans so far, the Agriculture Ministry said on Wednesday in a report with data updated through Nov. 17.

articles.title: Madonna Convinced the President of Argentina to Film 'Evita' At the Presidential Palace
articles.description: Madonna's hit movie 'Evita' was beloved for its portrayal of the former Argentinian First Lady. Madonna took the movie seriously
articles.content:
Madonna was a worldwide superstar by the mid-1990s, with several hit songs to her name. In the mid-’90s, she began the transformation into a renowned actor with her role in the movie musical Evita.

articles.title: Piranhas Attack Dozens of Swimmers and Rip Girl's Toe Off at Argentina Bathing Spot
articles.description: Santa Fe officials have said the Setúbal lagoon is closed for swimming following the attack.
articles.content:
Dozens of people have been attacked by piranhas at a popular swimming spot in Santa Fe, Argentina.
Images of the attack were published by local news websites. One 13-year-old girl had her toe torn off. Another image showed a chunk of flesh missing fr... [2273 chars]

articles.title: Rare cotton ball-like clouds spotted over Argentina: What are mammatus clouds?
articles.description: A video of mammatus clouds forming over a Argentina recently is doing the rounds on social media. The spectacular moments of the rare mammatus clouds were captured in Casa Grande, Córdoba. The clouds are shaped like cotton balls making it look surreal.

articles.title: Diego Maradona Accused of Raping Girl, 16, in 2000
articles.description: Mavys Alvarez had previously accused Maradona of being involved in trafficking her from Cuba to Argentina.
articles.content:
Mavys Alvarez, a 37-year-old woman from Cuba, said Diego Maradona raped her in 2000.
Alvarez had previously accused Maradona of playing a role in trafficking her from Cuba to Argentina.

articles.description: Diego Maradona is widely considered to be one of the greatest footballers in history and inspired Argentina to the 1986 World Cup He died last year after undergoing brain surgery on a blood clot and after decades of battles with cocaine and alcohol addictions
articles.content: Havana (Cuba) | AFP: A 37-year-old Cuban woman, who had an affair with Diego Maradona as a minor 20 years ago, accused the late Argentine idol and his entourage on Monday of violence and abuse, including rape and holding her against her will. Mavys A... [2493 chars]

articles.description: The complaint relates to a journey Alvarez took to Argentina with Maradona in 2001, when he was around 40 and she was 16.
